content.div:
With days getting longer and our jackets lighter, we start to look forward to meeting you all once again in Rovinj. For the 8th time in a row, we are organizing our learn & fun summer event. Mark your calendar for August 28th - 30th and join us in beautiful Rovinj.
This year you can expect hands-on and engaging workshops related to PHP, Symfony, Javascript and Project Management, as well as fun and relaxing after-workshop programme for attendees and their companions.
If you feel your workshop could add value to the event, we encourage you to submit your proposal by April 30th. All the information on this year's topics of our interest you can find here.
And while waiting for Early Bird tickets sale to start, here is a short reminder on Why Web Summer Camp of all events.
Summer is coming, follow us on @websummercamp and stay tuned!
